text: Bhima (, IAST: BhÄ«ma) is the second son of the Pandavas. The Mahabharata has many events which shows the strength of Bhima. Bhima is responsible for killing all hundred Kaurava brothers in the Kurukshetra War. He was considered to have the physical strength of around 10,000 elephants. ==References== Category:Mahabharata
title: Bhima
